dump_db.desc: Dumps a DB-Export from local MYSQL-Instance (optionally with table selection or data only).

import_db.desc: Imports a DB-Export (in Archive) to the local MYSQL-Instance

sync_config.desc: Synchronize Config/ConfigIndividual-Folders between Work and Repository (Eclipse-Repo)

bundle_product.desc: Bundles the jWEGAS-Product after an Eclipse-Export

dump_db_mand.desc: Export a DB-Dump for a single Mandant

delete_db_mand.desc: Delete all Mandant-Data from a db

extd_search.desc: Search EXTD/EXTI interactively with full text search

dump_table_to_csv.desc: Dumps a specific table from multiple SQL-Exports to a CSV

csv_merge.desc: Merge multiple CSV-Files (with same headers) into single file (with optional filter)

adb_bridge.desc: Activates an ADB-Bridge-Connection to an Android-Device

adb_intent.desc: Sends a configurable Intent to an Android-Device

graphql_schema_export.desc: Dump the Graph-QL-Schema from an Endpoint
